channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Harris: Trump 'capable of anything' on interfering with election results
item.description: She spoke in an an exclusive interview with ABC's Mary Bruce.

item.title: Phoenix man says hot asphalt during arrest caused third-degree burns
item.description: Michael Kenyon spent more than one month in the hospital after the incident recovering from his burns, his attorney said.

item.title: Helping seniors know when it's time to give up driving
item.description: Giving up driving can be a big loss of independence for seniors, and coming to the decision that it's no longer safe for them to be behind that wheel ...

item.title: 2024 election updates: Trump rides to rally in marked garbage truck
item.description: The hearing will come a day earlier than scheduled and the judge stipulated that all parties be present.

item.title: 10/30: The Daily Report

item.title: WATCH: First lady wears panda costume as Bidens host Halloween at the White House

item.title: White House cleans up Biden's 'garbage' comment as Trump seizes on it
item.description: Biden seemed to call Donald Trump supporters as “garbage” during a campaign call, but has insisted that he was referring to rhetoric at a Trump rally.

item.title: U.S. condemns Israeli airstrikes that killed dozens of civilians in Gaza
